sector_4.name: Sector 4 (The Rust Belt)

atmosphere.lighting: Dim amber streetlights, flickering neon signs (mostly glitching)
atmosphere.sounds: Distant sirens, hum of heavy machinery, dripping water
atmosphere.smells: Ozone, stale rain, frying street food

sector_4.description: A decaying industrial residential zone on the lower levels of the city. The buildings are brutalist concrete structures stained with acid rain. Cables hang like vines between rooftops.

doc_rileys_workshop.name: Doc Riley's Workshop

atmosphere.lighting: Bright white surgical lamps over workbenches, dark corners
atmosphere.sounds: The whir of cooling fans, soldering iron hiss, classical music playing on a vintage radio

doc_rileys_workshop.description: A cluttered basement workshop filled with scavenged tech. Servers hum in racks along the back wall. The center is dominated by a reinforced operating table used for illicit repairs.
items_of_interest: A jar of synthetic eyes on the shelf

black_lotus_bar.name: The Black Lotus

atmosphere.lighting: Deep purple mood lighting, strobe flashes
atmosphere.sounds: Heavy bass thumping through the floor, clinking glasses, hushed conversations

black_lotus_bar.description: A low-end dive bar frequented by fixers and runners. The booths are shielded for privacy. The bartender is a drone arm extending from the ceiling.
items_of_interest: The VIP booth in the back corner

arasaka_tower_lobby.name: Arasaka Tower Lobby

atmosphere.lighting: Sterile, cold white light, excessive brightness
atmosphere.sounds: Eerie silence, soft footsteps on marble, polite AI announcements

arasaka_tower_lobby.description: The opulence of the corporate elite. White marble floors, towering glass walls, and armed guards who look more machine than man. It feels like a temple to capitalism.
items_of_interest: Security scanners at the elevator banks
